TEXT.English: Spawns skeletons and more powerful undead if the barrow isn't eliminated.
TEXT.French: Génèrent des squelettes et des morts-vivants plus puissants s'ils ne sont pas éliminés.
TEXT.German: Ein Grabhügel sollte zerstört werden eh ihm Skelette und stärkere Untote entsteigen.
TEXT.Italian: Spawns skeletons and more powerful undead if the barrow isn't eliminated.
TEXT.Spanish: Genera esqueletos y no-muertos más poderosos si el túmulo no es eliminado.

TEXT.English: Ruins will spawn lizardmen if it isn't eliminated.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les Ruines génèreront des hommes-lézards s'ils ne sont pas éliminés
TEXT.German: Ruinen sollten zerstört werden eh ihnen Echsenkrieger entsteigen.
TEXT.Italian: Ruins will spawn lizardmen if it isn't eliminated.
TEXT.Spanish: Las ruinas generarán hombres-lagarto si no son eliminadas.

French.Text: Bandit de grand chemin:Bandits de grand chemin
Chef de clan centaure:Chefs de clan centaures

TEXT.English: Sandworms live beneath the sand. Attracted to rhythmic vibrations on the surface, they breach in pursuit of the origin of such vibrations. This is a way to hunt, as well as an effort to defend their territory, of which they were highly protective. Thus to see a worm, and live to tell about it, is extremely rare. Due to the difficulty of studying these creatures, not much is known about the wyrm. The longevity of the wyrm is supposedly extreme, estimated in the thousands of years.
